Posts.Content: Nov 17, 2007 04:08PM waterbaby wrote: Well ladies my OC basically blew me off also with my pains. My PC doc was the one who said it was from the chemo. My last chemo was May 05 and rad Sept 05. The pains didn't kick in until a few monhs after it was all over. I just don't understand why they don't tell you what you may feel like after its over...I did better during the treatments then afterwards.
Posts.Title: Joint pain after chemo Jesse Jesse
